subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Guillaume Latendresse scored the go-ahead goal midway through the third period after having a career-high three assists, leading the Minnesota Wild past the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins, 4-3, on Monday night.
snippet: Guillaume Latendresse scored the go-ahead goal midway through the third period after having a career-high three assists, leading the Minnesota Wild past the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins, 4-3, on Monday night.
